title: The Thunderbolt Adventure Hour
description: Join Thunderbolt, the greatest dog in the whole world, as he faces off with his archenemy, horse thief Dirty Dawson. Brought to you by Kanine Krunchies.
altHero: Thunderbolt, a german sheperd-like dog, pokes his head out from some desert rocks
alt2: Dirty Dawson on a horse running away and pointing a gun behind him
alt3: Thunderbolt pretending to be unconscious but giving a sly look
alt4: Dawson and Thunderbolt wrestling in the river near the edge of a waterfall
